thread.title: Jabrill Peppers understands critiques, but says he'll be a great fit wherever he's drafted
thread.title_full: Jabrill Peppers understands critiques, but says he'll be a great fit wherever he's drafted

author: Nick Baumgardner | nbaumgardner@mlive.com
title: Jabrill Peppers understands critiques, but says he'll be a great fit wherever he's drafted
text: ANN ARBOR -- Some scouts have called him the most versatile player in the NFL Draft. Others aren't so sure. Either way, former Michigan standout Jabrill Peppers continues to be one of the most talked-about prospects nationally right now. And...
